dcterms:creator: Samaneh Azadi
Matthew Fisher
Vladimir G Kim
Zhaowen Wang
Eli Shechtman
Trevor Darrell
dcterms:description: A dataset containing synthetic artistic fonts with 32,046 different font styles, each featuring 26 glyphs, used for pre-training the model.
dcterms:title: English glyph image dataset

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing 1,571,940 glyph images rendered from 639 representative Chinese characters in 246 normal Chinese font styles, enhanced with gradient colors and various stripe textures.
dcterms:title: Chinese glyph image dataset

dcterms:creator: Brenden M. Lake
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Joshua B. Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for human-level concept learning, containing a variety of handwritten characters from different alphabets.
dcterms:title: Omniglot dataset
